discussion.content:
The best approach for Universal Containers (UC) to use Experience Cloud to meet the needs of both B2C and B2B customers, while allowing B2B customers to assist in resolving B2C customer issues, is:

B. Create a digital experience for B2C customers, a partner portal for B2B customers, and use the internal CRM org for employees.

This setup provides:

 • A dedicated digital experience for B2C customers to manage their interactions.
 • A partner portal for B2B customers, which provides them access to necessary support functions, allowing them to collaborate with UC Support.
 • The internal CRM org for employees to coordinate and manage support processes efficiently.

This configuration separates the different user groups while enabling B2B customers to collaborate on B2C support issues as needed.

B. Ensure that the Account field is empty in the registration section – For B2C scenarios where individual customers self-register without needing a placeholder account, leaving the Account field empty allows Salesforce to create a Person Account automatically upon registration. This aligns with NTO’s use of Customer Community Plus licenses for individual customer personalization.

Selected Answer: C
C. Create a single digital experience for B2C customers, B2B customers, and employees.

A) doesn't make sense - as the group of B2B customers will work with the support team ( access to cases ) - s a Partner Portal is needed for them.
C) same 
D) is crap
so B) every group has its solution

Selected Answer: C
I believe the answer is C

questions.question_text:
Dreamscape Flowers (DF) is evaluating Salesforce Partner Relationship Management (PRM) to help improve its current channel sales performance.
In what two ways can Salesforce PRM help DF accelerate channel sales? (Choose two.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: BD
B - "By adding Revenue Cloud to your Sales Cloud PRM solution, you can extend automated quoting and renewal/subscription capabilities to your partners." Revenue Cloud = CPQ

D - "With the Lead Inbox in Sales Cloud PRM, leads are routed to the right partner without email. With Salesforce, all of the data is stored on one system of record, so you can track the lead’s activity in real time."

https://trailhead.salesforce.com/content/learn/modules/partner-relationship-management/accelerate-channel-sales

Not A or C as automations around partner tiering are focused on discount and approval workflows, not entitlements or hierarchy.
